title: Your children walking
creator_credit: Alex Strasser, Brian Smith and Realist Films
brief_description: Stresses the importance of adopting good foot habits and wearing suitable shoes and socks in childhood to develop strong, healthy feet. Studies the physiology of the foot.
creator_credit_for_label: Alex Strasser, Brian Smith and Realist Films
